name: Piyotama PSP
description:
Every spring Mother Piyo, "Piyomama", lays eggs to fill the forest with new colorful Piyos. However, this year, in all of her excitement, she laid too many! Piyotama® PSP® is an excitingly addictive action-puzzle game for your PSP® system that tasks players to help her hatch the eggs before they overflow the nest by simply lining up eggs of the same color and chaining them together four at a time to create combos for a hatching frenzy!

Download Piyotama® PSP® today!

* Addictive, easy-to-play gameplay appealing to players of all ages and levels. Match 4 or more eggs of the same color to hatch the Piyos.
* Enjoy infinite levels in the "Free Range" mode, or test your skills in timed play in "Egg Timer" mode
* Simple mechanics make Piyotama® PSP® accessible to players of all ages. Use the PSP® system shoulder buttons to shake the nest and force matched eggs to warm and hatch instantly.

Piyotama is a registered trademark of Sony Computer Entertainment America LLC © 2007 Sony Computer Entertainment Inc.

If you do not wish to accept these terms, do not purchase or use this item. One-time license fee for downloads to up to 2 portable systems that are associated with the purchasing account.
